remarks: De Morgan's law for GLB and LUB. Index-set version of ~ glbconN , where we read ` S ` as ` S ( i ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
glbcon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbcon.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
glbcon.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbcon.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
glbconxN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ A. i e. I S e. B ) -> ( G ` { x | E. i e. I x = S } ) = ( ._|_ ` ( U ` { x | E. i e. I x = ( ._|_ ` S ) } ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ i x $.
$d ._|_ x $.
$d B i x $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d K i $.
$d S x $.
